Text: O O̩jo̩, O̩jo̩-mi uwe̩ che, natejane̩ we̩ ejugbogbo,
Abe̩le̩ omi kejurʼuwe̩ ef uña kiafo̩ le̩,
Abe̩le̩ oñ nakele we̩ abu kʼu deju-i;
Onugo-mi che̩ko̩ me̩ alu kʼula kpai ura ako̩ e̩wñ,
e̩gba kʼu narewa we̩ oj ate̩-mi,
Ama abo ku ma tene onugo-mi ku ma fʼu ge̩ rinyo̩
Ma ako ma jo̩ ñw ukpahiu o̩kwo̩chageli,
